title: FRIDAY - Battle of the 'backs 2020
itunes:title: FRIDAY - Battle of the 'backs 2020
description:
Sunday will see a big-time running back matchup (0:10) when the Browns and Titans face off as Nick Chubb and Kareem Hunt face Derrick Henry. Hear what Henry has to say about the showdown. Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin (1:15) pulls no punches in his assessment of the Steelers defense after the loss of linebacker Bud Dupree. The Seahawks getting back another weapon on offense (2:10). Plus, we'll help you set your fantasy lineups as we give you an update you on some of the latest injuries from around the league (3:06)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
